programme.title: The Portable Door, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Let the Devil In
programme.desc: A chilling discovery of another body thrusts the town of Jefferson, NJ into the national spotlight; whispers of devil worship fuel the fire of a nation engulfed by Satanic Panic; as fear mounts, rumors blur what's real and the supernatural.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After serving three tours of duty on the front lines of Afghanistan and Iraq for the U.S. Army, Raul Sanchez seeks the comfort of comedy to help with his post-traumatic stress disorder; his act highlights the lighter side of everyday life and war.

programme.title: The Bounty, (1984, Adventure)
programme.desc: Mate Fletcher Christian (Mel Gibson) leads a mutiny against his friend Lt. Bligh (Anthony Hopkins) on an 18th-century voyage to Tahiti.

programme.title: Run the Tide, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When his drug-addicted mother leaves prison, a man (Taylor Lautner) kidnaps his younger brother (Nico Christou) and flees to the California coast for a better life.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: An ex-hockey player (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna (Moira Kelly) bicker as paired figure skaters shooting for the Olympics.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: A pregnant police chief (Frances McDormand) probes the murderous events that evolved from a desperate car salesman's (William H. Macy) kidnapping scheme.

programme.title: Gung Ho, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: American autoworkers have a hard time accepting new work ethics when a Japanese car manufacturer takes over.

programme.title: Benny & Joon, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: An eccentric's arrival complicates the lives of a protective brother and his mentally ill sister, threatening to upend their fragile world.

programme.title: Overboard, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: A yachtsman's (Edward Herrmann) wife (Goldie Hawn) falls overboard, forgets who she is and becomes an Oregon carpenter's (Kurt Russell) mate.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: An English charmer (Hugh Grant) and a lusty American (Andie MacDowell) make love over a course of surprising events.

programme.title: Notting Hill, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: A man's (Hugh Grant) life changes when an international star (Julia Roberts) walks into his bookshop.

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A freak accident gives a Chicago advertising executive (Mel Gibson) the ability to read women's minds.

programme.title: The Terminal, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A rich Midwestern lawyer (Paul Newman), his wife (Joanne Woodward) and their children grow apart in the World War II era.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: Exploring one's wild side with animal role play; reconnecting with a troubled couple; clowning around with a surprising dominatrix.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Four men hijack a crowded subway train and threaten to murder one hostage for every minute the ransom demand is late.

programme.title: Danica
programme.desc: Racing superstar Danica Patrick reveals herself like never before: as a competitor preparing for her next race, a woman confidently considering when she wants to start a family and a budding mogul carefully considering thinking about her next steps.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Doc Holliday (Kirk Douglas) joins Wyatt Earp (Burt Lancaster) and his brothers for a Tombstone showdown with the Clanton gang.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: Mulholland Falls, (1996, Mystery)
programme.desc: An ex-lover's murder creates problems for the married head (Nick Nolte) of an elite police unit in early '50s Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, who founded brokerage firm Stratton Oakmont while still in his early 20s, develops habits of wretched excess and corruption.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone (Marlon Brando) and his sons (Al Pacino, James Caan) rule their New York empire with Mafia justice.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II, (1974, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) rules his father's criminal empire, while flashbacks recall young Vito's (Robert De Niro) climb to power.

programme.title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (1990, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Dignified Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) joins his wild nephew in a Sicilian vendetta involving the Vatican.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Born and raised in Brooklyn, N.Y., Rob Christensen joins a crew and sells drugs to fit in; to escape that lifestyle, he joins the Air Force, goes to college and finds stand-up, a discovery that changes his life.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

programme.title: Transformers One, (2024, Animated)
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: Me Before You, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A paralyzed man (Sam Claflin) gets a new lease on life when a cheerful young woman (Emilia Clarke) becomes his caregiver.

programme.title: Emma, (1996, Romance)
programme.desc: Things keep getting worse after a young matchmaker (Gwyneth Paltrow) finds a mate for a simple young woman (Toni Collette) in rural 1800s England.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: A divorcee (Marilyn Monroe) joins an old cowboy (Clark Gable) and his partners rounding up wild horses for dog food.

programme.title: Ordinary People, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A suburban Chicago couple (Donald Sutherland, Mary Tyler Moore) and their son (Timothy Hutton) are torn apart by another son's death.

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: A convoluted courtship begins between a young woman (Keira Knightley) and the handsome friend (Matthew Macfadyen) of a wealthy bachelor.

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Suitors romance, then abandon, sisters (Emma Thompson, Kate Winslet) left destitute by their father's death in late-1800s England.

programme.title: Me Before You, (2016, Romance)
programme.desc: A paralyzed man (Sam Claflin) gets a new lease on life when a cheerful young woman (Emilia Clarke) becomes his caregiver.

programme.title: Gallipoli, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Two Outback runners (Mark Lee, Mel Gibson) join Australian and New Zealand troops fighting in World War I.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, History)
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace (Mel Gibson) leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king (Patrick McGoohan) in the 13th century.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates, (2001, War)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).

programme.title: Black Hawk Down, (2001, War)
programme.desc: U.S. soldiers encounter heavy fire while trying to capture a warlord's associates in Mogadishu, Somalia.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, War)
programme.desc: A pacifist farmer (Mel Gibson) of South Carolina reluctantly joins the Revolutionary War and fights alongside his son (Heath Ledger).

programme.title: Rob Roy, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: The Scottish folk hero (Liam Neeson) fights for clan and honor, hunted by vile aristocrats in the 1700s.

programme.title: Alive, (2019, Documentary)
programme.desc: Following the conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan, injured veterans turn to adaptive athletics to heal their physical and emotional battle wounds.

programme.title: Son of the Pink Panther, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau's old foe (Herbert Lom) hunts a missing princess with a clumsy gendarme (Roberto Benigni) who happens to be Clouseau's son.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates, (2001, War)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).

programme.desc: U.S. soldiers encounter heavy fire while trying to capture a warlord's associates in Mogadishu, Somalia.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, War)
programme.desc: A pacifist farmer (Mel Gibson) of South Carolina reluctantly joins the Revolutionary War and fights alongside his son (Heath Ledger).

programme.title: Sabrina, (1995, Romance)
programme.desc: Sons (Harrison Ford, Greg Kinnear) of a Long Island tycoon become romantic rivals for the chauffeur's daughter (Julia Ormond).

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Air Force One, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Demanding the release of a political prisoner, a terrorist and his gang hijack the U.S. president's plane.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: An IRA terrorist vows revenge against the ex-CIA agent who killed the man's brother and thwarted an attack on royalty.

programme.title: Eight Men Out, (1988, History)
programme.desc: Disgruntled Chicago White Sox stand trial for allegedly throwing the 1919 World Series for mobster Arnold Rothstein (Michael Lerner).

programme.title: Our Kind of Traitor, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: A money launderer (Stellan Skarsgard) for Russian gangsters asks a couple vacationing in Marrakech, Morocco, to deliver incriminating evidence to an MI6 agent (Damian Lewis).

programme.title: Catch-22, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: Air Force officers try to cope with the insanity of World War II in this adaptation of Joseph Heller's novel.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Clumsy Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) visits a nudist camp to prove a French maid (Elke Sommer) innocent of murder.

programme.title: The Accused, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: After three men rape a woman in a bar while people watch and cheer, she decides to seek punishment for the men who witnessed and encouraged the rape. To get justice, Sarah must take the stand and revisit the night of her attack.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.desc: The musketeers rescue their king's true heir from the Bastille.

programme.title: Gladiator II, (2024, History)
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honor needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team must track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity if it falls into the wrong hands. With control of the future and the fate of the world at stake, a deadly race around the globe begins.

programme.desc: A professional Beverly Hills escort falls in love with a big shot's wife and winds up framed for murder.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Adventure)
programme.desc: The musketeers rescue their king's true heir from the Bastille.

programme.title: Bananas, (1971, Comedy)

programme.title: Max 2: White House Hero, (2017, Children)
programme.desc: Max, a military service dog, is assigned to serve on the U.S. president's Secret Service detail.

programme.title: Throw Momma From the Train, (1987, Comedy)

programme.title: Orange County, (2002, Comedy)

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut, (1999, Animated)
programme.desc: Kyle, Stan and Cartman orchestrate a resistance to an imminent war between Canada and the United States.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A one-handed salesman, an Amish farm boy and a pretty con artist pull bowling scams to get to a $1 million tournament in Reno.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: A man and his wife move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: Nerve, (2016, Thriller)

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz, (1979, Thriller)

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Telling fortunes to support herself and her daughter, a psychic widow (Cate Blanchett) assists the police in a missing persons case.

programme.title: Set It Off, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting one another.

programme.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: With their futures threatened by false accusations of cheating, three teenagers take matters into their own hands.

programme.title: Good Boy, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sigrid thinks she's met the perfect match in Christian, but there's one catch: he lives with a man who acts like his pet dog. Trying to be open-minded, she continues the relationship but soon notices an insidious undertone to Christian.

programme.title: Wild Eyed and Wicked, (2023, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A woman tries to strike back at the medieval creature that's haunted her family for generations. To do so, she must learn how to draw upon a time of steel and blade when armor-clad knights rode out and dueled monsters to the death.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: A single woman (Jennifer Lopez) meets the man (Alex O'Loughlin) of her dreams on the same day she becomes pregnant through artificial insemination.

programme.title: Beneath, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Years after a car accident that disfigured an older sister, horrible visions, which come to pass , haunt the woman (Nora Zehetner) who was driving.

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Crime Story)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Hard Truths, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Pansy, angry and depressed, lashes out at family and strangers. Her constant criticism isolates her, except from her cheerful sister Chantelle, who remains sympathetic despite their differences.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: A single woman (Jennifer Lopez) meets the man (Alex O'Loughlin) of her dreams on the same day she becomes pregnant through artificial insemination.

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: A business owner (Jim Broadbent) reunites with his first love (Charlotte Rampling) after a letter and a diary force him to confront the past.

programme.title: Burke & Hare, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two 19th-century opportunists (Simon Pegg, Andy Serkis) become serial killers so that they can maintain their profitable business supplying cadavers to an anatomist (Tom Wilkinson).

programme.title: Case 39, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: A social worker (Renée Zellweger) saves a girl (Jodelle Ferland) from abusive parents but finds there is more to the child than meets the eye.

programme.title: Wrong Turn, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life.

programme.title: Vindicta, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a city is terrorized by a sadistic serial killer, a seasoned detective and a newly recruited paramedic are forced into a deadly game of vengeance, only to discover the key to stopping the bloodshed lies in unlocking the truth of their own pasts.

programme.desc: After a scary mugging, Robin, pregnant and going for partner at her big-city law firm, decides she needs less stress in her life. She convinces her reluctant husband Ben, to move to the country where it is safer and calmer. Small town life seems picture perfect until their next-door neighbors pull them into their twisted fantasy.

programme.title: The Neighbors Are Watching (2023), (2023, Action/adventure)
programme.desc: When a handsome neighbor moves in across the street, a single woman trying to escape her past in the new subdivision believes she has witnessed her new neighbor committing a grisly murder. Unfortunately, nobody believes her. She is then forced to face her dark past head-on in a story full of twists, turns, and shocking revelations.

programme.title: Is There A Killer On My Street? (2020), (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: When Lindsay falls for her new neighbor and dead bodies start to accumulate, she begins to fear her life may be in grave danger.

programme.title: The Neighbor Who Saw Too Much (2024), (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: A grounded teen becomes convinced that her hot new neighbor is actually a dangerous killer, and when no one else believes her, she takes matters into her own hands.

programme.title: A View To Kill For (2023), (2023, Action/adventure)
programme.desc: After inheriting her estranged father's mansion, photographer Molly and her family relocate to the exclusive neighborhood and try to adjust to life as part of the 1%. But when a stranger breaks into their new home and leaves a warning message splattered on the wall, Molly is soon being run out of town by a mysterious threat.

programme.title: Seduced By My Neighbor (2018), (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Single mom Sarah moves into the suburbs and starts dating a firefighter, only to find herself the target of an obsessive neighborhood watchman who aims to prove he's the best man to protect her, even if he has to create the danger himself.

programme.title: The Last Woman Who Lived Here (2025), (2025, Mystery & Suspense)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Charlotte and her husband, Joel, pack up their lives in the big city and head to the suburbs, where they find an incredible deal on a beautiful home. Yet all is not what it seems. Their house is "the murder house", and Charlotte soon finds clues left by the former resident before her murder, making her question which one of their neighbors knew all along and have been covering it up.

programme.title: Danger in the Countryside (2025), (2025, Mystery & Suspense)
programme.desc: Facing eviction and at her wits' end, a single mom answers a strange but enticing ad offering free rent in exchange for household chores, unwittingly plunging her and her family into grave danger. Nicole Reddinger, Paul Van Scott, Gisele Frame, Ryan Anthony Holcomb, Piper Collins, and John Castle star (2025).

programme.title: Stalked by My Neighbor (2015), (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: A mother and her 18-year-old daughter move to suburbia to help recover from a traumatic home invasion, but a sinister shadow seems to be stalking them.

programme.title: The Wrong Wedding Planner (2020), (2020, Other)
programme.desc: Detective Jones investigates a mysterious break-in at the home of a young couple, Ashley and Brad, who are blissfully engaged and preparing for their upcoming marriage. While Det. Jones discovers nothing at the scene, we later find out it is their wedding planner, Mandy, who starts stalking them.

programme.title: The Walls Are Watching (2022), (2022, Mystery & Suspense)
programme.desc: A young couple is terrorized by the former owner of the home they now occupy. Instead of a honeymoon, life becomes a cat and mouse game for these newlyweds as they try to survive being hunted by a man who knows every inch of the residence better than they do; and who has nothing left to lose.

programme.title: If Walls Could Talk (2023), (2023, Mystery & Suspense)
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. After the death of her father, Olivia Garland moves home to help her mother, Rebecca. She becomes concerned about Rebecca's claims of a ghost in the house and wonders if Rebecca is beginning to decline mentally. When Rebecca breaks her hip, Olivia hires health aide Jake Winters, whose patience and warmth seem too good to be true, and when strange things keep happening, Olivia must decide who she can trust and how to keep her and her mother safe.

programme.title: My Sister's Serial Killer Boyfriend (2022), (2022, Action/adventure)
programme.desc: Maddie, a local reporter investigating a series of killings targeting similar looking women, is caught off guard when her younger sister Olivia is attacked in her own home. Urging on the side of caution, Maddie suggests they take a self-defense course. When Olivia starts to fall for their instructor, Maddie becomes skeptical when he refuses to reveal anything about himself, and tries to intervene before the relationship turns into a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Home, Not Alone (2023), (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Sara Wilson and her 18-year-old daughter, Jordyn, move into their dream home in a great neighborhood to make a fresh start. But when strange occurrences start happening in the house, Sara can't help but feel danger is lurking closer than she thinks.

programme.title: Secrets in the Basement (2020), (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Delilah and her husband Shawn are overjoyed to leave their troubles in the city behind and begin their fresh start in their new smart home in the suburbs. Meeting Jay, the charming man who designed their house, Delilah feels that they will settle in well there. Unbeknownst to them, their beautiful new house is harboring a masked figure in the basement. Delilah begins to suspect that someone else is in the house, and Delilah and Shawn must fight to escape their safe haven with their lives.

programme.title: Mommy Meanest (2024), (2024, Arts & Literature)
programme.desc: A mother fights to protect her daughter from a mysterious harasser as they navigate the challenges of growing independence.

programme.desc: A teacher is blackmailed by a student's ex-con father when he learns of their friendship, causing the boy to be an unwitting conspirator in the scheme.

programme.title: Remember Me, Mommy? (2020), (2020, Mystery & Suspense)
programme.desc: Rebecca, a teacher at Clark Academy® an elite girls boarding school, has a secret. She gave up a daughter as a young teen. Unbeknownst to Rebecca, that daughter, Elena has enrolled in Clark Academy® to meet her birth mother. Elena who ended up in multiple foster homes and had a terrible childhood, comes to think that Rebecca should have kept her and decides to wreak revenge. Natalie Brown, Sydney Meyer, and Amalia Williamson star.

programme.title: Sleeping with My Student (2019), (2019, Mystery & Suspense)
programme.desc: New school headmaster and single mother Kathy discovers her vacation fling with charming 18-year-old Ian was no accident when he transfers to her school with a dangerous scheme targeting Kathy and her teenage daughter Bree. Ian wants revenge as he believes Kathy is responsible for splitting up his family leading to his father's death. Kathy will need to uncover Ian's motives quickly if she hopes to protect herself and Bree from his dangerous threats.

programme.title: Abducted by My Teacher: The Elizabeth Thomas Story (2023), (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the 36-day odyssey of 15-year-old Elizabeth Thomas, who was abducted by a trusted teacher who had groomed her and convinced her that he would kill himself if she didn't leave town with him. Elizabeth knew that she wasn't safe with him, though, and left clues and notes along the way, helping lead rescuers to them. At one point in their cross-state journey, her abductor thought they would be able to flee to Mexico in a kayak, a plan that went completely awry.

programme.title: The Wrong Teacher (2018), (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Successful teacher and author, Charlotte Hansen has a passionate, one night stand with a younger man, Chris Williams. She finds out later he is 18-years-old and a new transfer student at her high school. Now, he will not let go of her. While Principal Burns and Vice Principal Clark discover there is something going on between teacher and student, Chris will stop at nothing to have her for himself.

programme.title: Secret Life of a Student (2021), (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Lauren Blois finds her life going upside down. Her job, the custody of her adopted daughter, and her safety are in danger when a student claims to have had an affair with her.

programme.title: What Hides in Silence (2024), (2024, Other)
programme.desc: Tiffany, an ASL teacher with a tragic past, takes on new student Amy and sparks a romance with the teen's father. But when her life is threatened, she realizes her past has come back to haunt her. Now, Tiffany will need to confront the pain she's hidden for so long in order to save herself and her student before it's too late. Aubrey Reynolds, Haley Baird Riemer, and Gina Vitori star (2025).

programme.desc: A student rejects her professor's offer for grades, putting her life at risk. Her mother races against time to protect her from a deadly secret.

programme.title: Bones, (2007)
programme.desc: When a water main bursts at a cemetery, Brennan must identify and help reinter the remains that litter the grounds.

programme.title: Bones, (2007)
programme.desc: Booth suspects an organized-crime family when a partial skeleton is found encased in concrete, and he tries to lure the suspected killer out of hiding; Brennan gets a surprise visit from her father (Ryan O'Neal) while visiting her mother's grave.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2019)
programme.desc: MacGyver and Desi help a group of Syrian refugees who are being pursued by human traffickers; Bozer is trapped in Oversight's car, and it's rigged to explode.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2019)
programme.desc: Two American tourists go missing while doing a scavenger hunt through some of the world's most dangerous countries; the Phoenix team goes under cover as backpackers to find them and bring them home alive.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2019)
programme.desc: A cunning new adversary's carefully crafted plans force Mac to make an impossible choice: save the life of a friend or save the lives of hundreds of innocents; Mac receives new information that will drive a wedge between him and his father.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2019)
programme.desc: Matty's ex-husband, Ethan, asks her for help when a criminal organization kidnaps his wife and daughter; Matty must decide if she's willing to commit treason to help Ethan; Riley joins Billy Colton and Mama Colton on a mission to Paris.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2020)
programme.desc: Ex-MI6 agent Russ Taylor recruits former Phoenix Foundation members Mac, Riley, Bozer, Matty and Desi to hunt down a bioweapon that's planned to be used by a mysterious organization for a devastating attack on a major US city.

programme.title: MacGyver, (2020)
programme.desc: Gen. John Acosta recruits MacGyver to steal a highly classified project from a military lab to find flaws in its security.
